section1.text: Everyone experiences stress in different ways. Let Alivio guide you, in a personalized journal experience, to overcome your stress.

article.name: How it works
article.description: Understand & Release the stress in 3 steps
article.text: Alivio offers as many journals it takes, tackling different areas such as anxiety, overwhelmedness, sadness, or anger, and a variety of personal causes, to help you become aware of your emotions, and guide you in how to manage stress.

blocks.name: Personalize
blocks.text: Answer a quick survey about how you express yourself, what causes you stress, and what area would you like to work on. This way, we can fully personalize your journal!

blocks.name: Write & Understand
blocks.text: Write, draw, reflect, understand. Alivio will guide you through the prompts and will help you manage your stress!

blocks.name: Alivio
blocks.text: Now you are aware, and have a way to manage and overcome your own stress. What are you waiting for? Alivio today!

About.story: Let's hear about Kayla's success story
About.text: See how well Alivio works in a real customerâ€™s life.

OurProduct.name: Our product
OurProduct.h2: You tell us your stress, We make your diary
OurProduct.text: Everyone experiences it, and in different ways. Let Alivio guide you, in a personalized journal experience, to overcome your stress.
